bibl.title: Letter from Lydia Cabrera to Philip Showalter Hench, August 17, 1953

div1.p: Cabrera informs Hench that she has asked the Minister of State to award him the decoration of Carlos Manuel de Cespedes.

div1.head: Letter from Lydia Cabrera to Philip Showalter Hench, August 17, 1953

opener.dateline:
QUINTA SAN JOSE
REDENCION
MARIANAO-CUBA
August 17, 1953

div1.p:
Titina does not want you to walk behind her,
just because she wants to watch you! But I
want to see you with all the golden hangings
(decorations) of the Pearl of the Antilles.
Let me tell you -confidentially- that I asked
for you the Orden of Carlos Manuel de Ceśpedes
and that the answer of the Minister of State
was: 6 Será un gran honor para la Orden.

I hope you are all well. Give my love to Mary
and try to come in december with her. It will
give such a great plesure to your good friend
